DOC.brief_summary: This study retrospective chart review patient treat bipolar disorder TVAMC past four year cross-referenced electronic pharmacy file receive prescription divalproex lamotrigine .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study assess long-term outcome bipolar patient treat divalproex versus lamotrigine retrospective chart review veteran measure time relapse significant mood episode ( i.e . mania depression ) . The primary hypothesis bipolar patient demonstrate significantly great time relapse treat divalproex compare treated lamotrigine . The secondary objective study assess safety relative tolerability divalproex lamotrigine population base discontinuation due side adverse effect .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Bipolar I Bipolar II disorder Prescription divalproex ( formulation except Depakene/valproic acid ) lamotrigine electronic pharmacy profile . Age 19 old Demonstrated stability least 4 week adequate dose medication ( least 50mg/d lamotrigine 15mg/kg/day divalproex ) . Treatment TVAMC least 6 month follow prescription divalproex lamotrigine . Primary diagnosis schizoaffective schizophrenia evaluation period . Prescription divalproex lamotrigine give concurrently observation period . History Dementia cognitive disorder
